categories: Category:Imperial Intelligence personnel of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: Medle was a male Human and captain in Imperial Intelligence during the Cold War. Formerly an Imperial soldier, he led a covert mission that he described as going "too well", which resulted in his transfer to Imperial Intelligence, which he did not enjoy. He was one of the contacts of the Grand Champion of the Great Hunt.
Medle can be spared for light side points. If spared he would latter send a letter to the Hunter with credits attached.
